::Dragoon::
    He listens to the message from Ultimo.  He uses the Sulaco computers to 
track down the signal.  He takes off for the location.  Shortly after take 
off he sends a message to Ultimo on his private channel.  "We are Dragoon.  
We are interested in training against you.  We wish to test our new body."
